data.deskripsi_posisi:
SUMMARY
To produce a clean room of a very high standard and ensure that the amenities in the room are sufficiently supplied for the convenience and comfort of the guest.
	
ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
1.	Responsible for the cleanliness and maintenance of all assigned rooms and areas. 
2.	Receives room keys and instructions from Supervisor before starting work and returns the keys after the shift ends. 
3.	In  the morning, checks occupancy of rooms in his section and reports to the Supervisor. 
4.	Receives equipment, cleaning supplies and linen from the Floor Supervisor. 
5.	Checks guest supplies and condition of the rooms. 
6.	Reports any missing or damaged items found in the rooms or assigned areas directly to the Supervisor. 
7.	Prepares the Room Boy cart with supplies before cleaning and making rooms up daily. 
8.	Reports and turns over lost and found articles to the Supervisor. 
9.	Cleans and makes up room according to instructions and set standards, with particular attention paid to: 
10.	Making up bed - change bed sheet and pillowcases and if necessary also change blanket and bed cover. 
11.	Clean floor with carpet sweeper or vacuum. 
12.	Dusting and cleaning ashtrays and wastebaskets. 
13.	Change towels and replenish supplies such as matches, stationary, facial tissue, toilet paper, and soap. 
14.	Refill water jug and mineral water. 
15.	Clean closet doors, walls, ceiling, air conditioner grill, mirrors, windows, shelving, and papers. 
16.	Clean bathroom: wall, bathtub, washbasin, mirrors, counter, urinals, toilet bowls, and floor. 
17.	Change towels and replenish soap. 
18.	Checks with Supervisor to see if there are any special requirements. 
19.	Pays special attention to VIP rooms. 
20.	Polish guest's shoes when requested. 
21.	Prepares extra bed and attends to special requests from guests such as extra towel, soap, matches etc. 
22.	Maintains cleanliness in guest and service areas. 
23.	Reports on the presence of any suspicious person in the hotel to the Supervisor. 
24.	Completes Room Boy assignment report daily and reports on supplies and linen consumption. 
25.	Ensures the weekly schedule for special cleaning work is correctly carried out. 
26.	Reports on any problems or requirements for guestroom or other areas to the Supervisor  who passes theinformation on to the next shift

COMPETENCIES REQUIRED
1.	Ability to deal with guests
2.	Able to working under tight deadlines.
3.	Good communication skills
4.	Ability to take initiatives
5.	Expert decision making abilities
6.	Teamwork and personal impact
7.	Clear and assertive communication
8. Attention to detail
9.	Honest and responsible

perusahaan.alamat: ASTON RASUNA RESIDENCE,KOMP APARTEMEN TMN RASUNA,JL HR RASUNA SAID

data.deskripsi_posisi:
1. Membuat, menulis, dan mengembangkan ide konten (teks, foto, video, maupun infografis) untuk media sosial, website, dan kanal komunikasi digital Pusat Pasar Kerja.

2. Mengelola kalender konten serta membantu perencanaan kampanye digital tematik.

3. Melakukan riset topik terkait ketenagakerjaan, peluang kerja, dan kegiatan Kementerian Ketenagakerjaan untuk dijadikan materi publikasi.

4. Membantu proses pengambilan gambar dan video untuk kegiatan internal maupun eksternal.

5. Mengedit konten foto dan video sesuai standar branding Pusat Pasar Kerja

6. Berkoordinasi dengan tim Humas, Desain Grafis, dan Pengelola Website untuk memastikan konsistensi pesan dan visual.

7. Memantau performa konten (engagement, reach, dan feedback) untuk evaluasi efektivitas publikasi.
